title: Vätti
text:
Vätti is a <a href="Districts%20of%20Turku">district</a> of the <a href="city">city</a> of <a href="Turku">Turku</a>, in <a href="Finland">Finland</a>. It is located to the north of the city centre. The area consists mostly of parkland, but there is also a high-density residential area in the district as well as some low-density developments. There is also an old people's home in Vätti.
The current () population of Vätti is 2,990, and it is decreasing at an annual rate of 0.07%. 11.30% of the district's population are under 15 years old, while 30.60% are over 65. The district's <a href="language">linguistic</a> makeup is 95.45% Finnish, 2.37% Swedish, and 2.17% other.
